list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a container filled with explosive, incendiary material, smoke, gas, or other destructive substance, designed to explode on impact or when detonated by a time mechanism, remote-control device, or lit fuse.
a lump of lava thrown out by a volcano.
a movie, play, or other event that fails badly.
a long forward pass or hit in a ball game.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a big 40-yard bomb down the middle to tight end Howard Cross
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một quả bom lớn 40 yard xuống giữa để chặt kết thúc Howard Cross

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: attack (a place or vehicle) with a bomb or bombs.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: London was bombed, night after night
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: London bị đánh bom, đêm qua đêm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a movie, play, or other event) fail miserably.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a big-budget movie that bombed at the box office
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một bộ phim ngân sách lớn bị ném bom tại phòng vé
